#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<climits>

using namespace std;

#define SI(n)		scanf("%lld",&n);
#define LL		long long int

int main()
{
	LL tc;
	SI(tc);
	while(tc--)
	{
		LL n;
		SI(n);
		LL a[n];
		int i;
		LL ex=0;
		LL ans=LONG_MAX;
		LL flag=0;
		LL sum=0;
		LL avg=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			SI(a[i]);
			sum+=a[i];
			avg=sum/(i+1);
			ans=min(avg,ans);
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
